text: Shunduk () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Ponezhukayskoye Rural Settlement of Teuchezhsky District, the Republic of Adygea, Russia. The population was 17 as of 2018. There is 1 street. == Geography == The khutor is located on the right bank of the Shunduk river. == References == Category:Rural localities in Teuchezhsky District
title: Shunduk (village)
